cyclone.name: BETA
cyclone.current_location: about 110 miles ESE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: Moving WNW toward the central Texas coast, then forecast to slow, turn north and finally northeast across Louisiana toward Mississippi later in the week
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast near Port O'Connor–Matagorda Bay

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas, TX
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Port Aransas, TX to Morgan City, LA; Storm-Surge Warning from Port Aransas, TX to Rockefeller Wildlife Refuge, LA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Middle Texas coast eastward through southern Louisiana and into the lower Mississippi Valley
weather_observation.wind: Sustained tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely; breezy conditions 20–30 mph with higher gusts possible late Wed–Thu.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge 1–3 ft possible in Lake Pontchartrain and adjacent coastal sections.
weather_observation.rainfall: Potential for 4–8 in of rain with locally higher totals, leading to flash and urban flooding.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Flash-flooding of low-lying/poor-drainage areas; dangerous rip currents along Gulf beaches.
